birth_place.zh-cn: 福建省上杭县南阳官余
birth_place.en: Guanyu, Nanyang, Shanghang County, Fujian Province

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的政治人物，原副国级领导人。曾任中共中央书记处书记、中央政法委员会书记、第六届全国人民代表大会常务委员会副委员长、中共上海市委第一书记等职务。在文化大革命期间受到迫害，后在毛泽东和邓小平的干预下复出。
description.en: A political figure of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a former leader of Vice-national level. He served as Secretary of the CPC Central Secretariat, Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission, Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Sixth National People's Congress, and First Secretary of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee. He was persecuted during the Cultural Revolution and later rehabilitated with the intervention of Mao Zedong and Deng Xiaoping.

description.zh-cn: 陈丕显的出生地。
description.en: Birthplace of Chen Pixian.

description.zh-cn: 陈丕显的逝世地。
description.en: Place of death of Chen Pixian.

description.zh-cn: 南阳暴动的领导者。
description.en: Leader of the Nanyang Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 由罗化成领导的暴动，陈丕显参与了此次暴动。
description.en: An uprising led by Luo Huacheng, in which Chen Pixian participated.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导的先进青年的群团组织。陈丕显于1929年加入，并长期在此组织中担任领导职务。
description.en: A mass organization of advanced youth led by the Communist Party of China. Chen Pixian joined in 1929 and held leadership positions in this organization for a long time.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。陈丕显于1931年加入。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China. Chen Pixian joined in 1931.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一。中央红军长征后，与陈毅等留在南方领导游击战争。陈丕显曾是其下属。
description.en: One of the early leaders of the Communist Party of China. After the Long March of the Central Red Army, he remained in the south with Chen Yi to lead the guerrilla war. Chen Pixian was his subordinate.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国十大元帅之一。中央红军长征后，与项英等留在南方领导游击战争。陈丕显曾是其下属。
description.en: One of the Ten Marshals of the People's Republic of China. After the Long March of the Central Red Army, he remained in the south with Xiang Ying to lead the guerrilla war. Chen Pixian was his subordinate.

description.zh-cn: 中央红军主力长征后，项英、陈毅等人领导的留在南方中央苏区的红军部队进行的游击战争。陈丕显参与了此次战争。
description.en: The guerrilla war waged by the Red Army forces left behind in the southern Central Soviet Area, led by Xiang Ying, Chen Yi, and others, after the main force of the Central Red Army embarked on the Long March. Chen Pixian participated in this war.

description.zh-cn: 由陈丕显等人于1940年创建的抗日根据地。
description.en: An anti-Japanese base area established by Chen Pixian and others in 1940.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在苏中地区的领导机构。陈丕显曾任该机构副书记和书记。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in the Central Jiangsu region. Chen Pixian served as its deputy secretary and secretary.

description.zh-cn: 新四军在苏中地区的军事组织。陈丕显曾任该军区政委。
description.en: The military organization of the New Fourth Army in the Central Jiangsu region. Chen Pixian served as its political commissar.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军主要领导人，十大大将之首。曾指挥苏中战役，陈丕显在此战役中负责支援工作。
description.en: A main leader of the People's Liberation Army, ranked first among the ten Grand Generals. He commanded the Central Jiangsu Campaign, during which Chen Pixian was responsible for support work.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战期间，由粟裕指挥的一场战役。陈丕显负责支前任务，为战役胜利作出贡献。
description.en: A campaign during the second Chinese Civil War commanded by Su Yu. Chen Pixian was responsible for front-line support tasks and contributed to the victory of the campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中国人民解放军和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。他曾称赞陈丕显完成土改和镇反任务出色，并在陈丕显于文革中被关押后批示对其从宽处理。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Liberation Army, and the People's Republic of China. He praised Chen Pixian for his outstanding work in land reform and suppressing counter-revolutionaries, and later approved lenient treatment for Chen after his imprisonment during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期在全国范围内进行的土地所有制改革运动。
description.en: A nationwide land ownership reform movement carried out in the early days of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期展开的政治运动，旨在肃清国内的反革命分子。
description.en: A political movement launched in the early days of the People's Republic of China aimed at eliminating domestic counter-revolutionaries.

zh-cn: 中国共产党上海市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在上海市的领导机关。陈丕显曾长期在此任职，并担任过第一书记。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Shanghai. Chen Pixian held positions here for a long time and served as First Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任上海市市长。在陈丕显因病休养期间代理上海市委第一书记。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China, former Mayor of Shanghai. He served as acting First Secretary of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee while Chen Pixian was on medical leave.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国时期的一场重大政治运动，对中国社会造成了深远影响。陈丕显在此期间遭到迫害，被长期关押审查。
description.en: A major political movement during the period of the People's Republic of China, which had a profound impact on Chinese society. Chen Pixian was persecuted during this period, being imprisoned and investigated for a long time.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间发生在上海的夺权事件，时任上海市委第一书记的陈丕显在此事件中被夺权。
description.en: A power seizure event that occurred in Shanghai during the Cultural Revolution. Chen Pixian, then First Secretary of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee, was overthrown in this event.

description.zh-cn: “四人帮”成员之一，文化大革命期间担任重要职务。他曾阻挠陈丕显的复出。
description.en: A member of the "Gang of Four" who held important positions during the Cultural Revolution. He obstructed the rehabilitation of Chen Pixian.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心，改革开放的总设计师。他曾帮助推动陈丕显的复出和工作安排。
description.en: The core of the second generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China and the chief architect of the reform and opening-up. He helped facilitate the rehabilitation and work arrangements for Chen Pixian.

zh-cn: 中国共产党湖北省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在湖北省的领导机关。陈丕显曾任该委员会第一书记。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Hubei Province. Chen Pixian served as its First Secretary.

en: Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会领导和管理政法工作的职能部门。陈丕显曾任该委员会书记。
description.en: A functional department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China that leads and manages political and legal work. Chen Pixian served as its Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局常委、全国人大常委会委员长。他接替陈丕显担任中央政法委员会书记。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China, who served as a member of the Standing Committee of the CPC Politburo and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress. He succeeded Chen Pixian as Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission.

nodes.id: 第六届全国人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 第六届全国人民代表大会常务委员会
第六届全国人民代表大会
en: Standing Committee of the 6th National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第六届最高国家权力机关的常设机关。陈丕显曾任其副委员长。
description.en: The permanent body of the 6th highest state power organ of the People's Republic of China. Chen Pixian served as its Vice Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 罗化成是南阳暴动的领导者。
description.en: Luo Huacheng was the leader of the Nanyang Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 陈丕显参加了南阳暴动，这是他革命生涯的开端。
description.en: Chen Pixian participated in the Nanyang Uprising, which marked the beginning of his revolutionary career.

description.zh-cn: 陈丕显于1929年9月加入中国共产主义青年团，并担任过少共南阳区儿童团总团长等职务。
description.en: Chen Pixian joined the Communist Youth League of China in September 1929 and served in positions such as the head of the Children's Corps in the Nanyang area.

description.zh-cn: 在三年游击战争期间，陈丕显随项英、陈毅等人一起行动，并在其领导下工作。
description.en: During the Three Years' Guerrilla War, Chen Pixian acted with Xiang Ying and Chen Yi and worked under their leadership.

description.zh-cn: 在三年游击战争期间，陈丕显随项英、陈毅等人一起行动，并在其领导下工作。
description.en: During the Three Years' Guerrilla War, Chen Pixian acted with Xiang Ying and Chen Yi and worked under their leadership.

description.zh-cn: 1940年，陈丕显随部队东进，创建了苏中抗日根据地。
description.en: In 1940, Chen Pixian moved east with his troops and established the Central Jiangsu Anti-Japanese Base Area.

description.zh-cn: 陈丕显在粟裕指挥的苏中战役中担负支前任务，为战斗取得“七战七捷”作出了贡献。
description.en: In the Central Jiangsu Campaign commanded by Su Yu, Chen Pixian undertook front-line support tasks and contributed to the "seven victories in seven battles".

description.zh-cn: 1952年左右，毛泽东称赞陈丕显完成土地改革和镇压反革命任务出色。1974年9月17日，毛泽东批示对在文革中被关押的陈丕显“似可作人民内部问题处理”，促使其复出。
description.en: Around 1952, Mao Zedong praised Chen Pixian for his outstanding completion of land reform and the suppression of counter-revolutionaries. On September 17, 1974, Mao instructed that Chen Pixian, who was imprisoned during the Cultural Revolution, could be 'handled as an issue among the people,' which facilitated his comeback.

position.zh-cn: 第四书记、第二书记、书记处书记、第一书记
position.en: Fourth Secretary, Second Secretary, Secretariat Secretary, First Secretary

description.zh-cn: 因陈丕显罹患鼻癌治疗休养，由曹荻秋代理上海市委第一书记。
description.en: Due to Chen Pixian's medical leave for nasopharyngeal cancer treatment, Cao Diqiu served as the acting First Secretary of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命爆发后，陈丕显在“一月风暴”中被夺权，此后被长期关押和隔离审查。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Cultural Revolution, Chen Pixian's power was seized during the 'January Storm,' and he was subsequently imprisoned and held in solitary confinement for investigation for a long period.

description.zh-cn: 在上海“一月风暴”中，时任上海市委第一书记的陈丕显被夺权。
description.en: During the 'January Storm' in Shanghai, Chen Pixian, then First Secretary of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee, was overthrown.

description.zh-cn: 在毛泽东对陈丕显的信件作出批示后，张春桥等人对陈丕显的复出进行了阻挠。
description.en: After Mao Zedong gave instructions on Chen Pixian's letter, Zhang Chunqiao and others obstructed his rehabilitation.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平在复出后，收到陈丕显的求助信，并向毛泽东提议恢复陈丕显的组织生活和工资，并最终促成其调离上海到北京工作。
description.en: After his own rehabilitation, Deng Xiaoping received a letter from Chen Pixian asking for help. Deng then proposed to Mao Zedong to restore Chen's party membership and salary, and eventually facilitated his transfer from Shanghai to Beijing.

relationships.target: 第六届全国人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 陈丕显卸任中央政法委员会书记职务，由乔石接替。
description.en: Chen Pixian stepped down as Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission, and was succeeded by Qiao Shi.
